entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
